00022 #include "whiptk/whip_toolkit.h"
00023 #include "whiptk/w2d_class_factory.h"
00024 
00025 extern WT_File *whip_file; //Assume this has been opened for writing elsewhere.
00026 
00027 WT_Result DrawingInfo()
00028 {
00029     WT_W2D_Class_Factory cf;
00030 
00031     // Set the metadata
00032     whip_file->desired_rendition().drawing_info().author().set("Jeffrey Klug");
00033     whip_file->desired_rendition().drawing_info().comments().set("Example code");
00034     whip_file->desired_rendition().drawing_info().copyright().set("Copyright 2003, Autodesk, Inc.");
00035     whip_file->desired_rendition().drawing_info().creator().set("Example.exe");
00036     whip_file->desired_rendition().drawing_info().description().set("Drawing file used to test the WHIP! toolkit");
00037     whip_file->desired_rendition().drawing_info().keywords().set("Keywords");
00038     whip_file->desired_rendition().drawing_info().subject().set("Testing");
00039     whip_file->desired_rendition().drawing_info().title().set("Test drawing");
00040     // Force it to be written to disk
00041     WD_CHECK(whip_file->desired_rendition().drawing_info().sync(*whip_file));
00042 
00043     return WT_Result::Success;
00044 }
